steps.headline: Cook the noodles.
steps.description:

steps.headline: Season the ramen.
steps.description: Add the garlic powder and one teaspoon of olive oil. Lightly stir the noodles with a fork to get the noodles seasoned thoroughly.

steps.headline: Create the "ramen pizza crust".
steps.description: Add the remaining olive oil to a non-stick skillet and place it over medium heat. Add the noodles to the skillet and use a spatula to evenly spread the noodles out to make a flat circle surface. Allow the bottom of the noodles to lightly brown, about 3 minutes over the heat. Remove the skillet from the heat.

steps.headline: Make the pizza.
steps.description: Use the back of a flat spatula to distribute the sauce evenly over the noodles. Dress the pizza with the mozzarella cheese and the toppings of your liking.

steps.headline: Heat the pizza under a broiler.
steps.description: Under a 350 degree F broiler, allow the cheese to melt and the pizza to warm, for about five minutes.

Add the remaining olive oil to a non-stick skillet and place it over medium heat. Add the noodles to the skillet and use a spatula to evenly spread the noodles out to make a flat circle surface. Allow the bottom of the noodles to lightly brown, about 3 minutes over the heat. Remove the skillet from the heat. Make the pizza. Use the back of a flat spatula to distribute the sauce evenly over the noodles. Dress the pizza with the mozzarella cheese and the toppings of your liking. Heat the pizza under a broiler. Under a 350 degree F broiler, allow the cheese to melt and the pizza to warm, for about five minutes. Serve immediately.
